channel.title: Wrong Section - But i HAVE To Post This
channel.description:
Well, Ever since i have started working on 503s (Some of you know bout it , its called ploxage 503: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,298939.0.html), Jagex has slowly started taking me down.
Step 1 - Deleting Videos Off Youtube....
Here is the AMOUNT Of Videos Left (WE HAD ABOUT 200+)
[img]http://i35.tinypic.com/15gs3g1.jpg[/img]
Step 2 - They Banned my youtube account...
[img]http://i33.tinypic.com/111lel4.jpg[/img]
Step 3 - They Deleted The Download link to my client...
[img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2ql5tgk.jpg[/img]
Step 4 - They Got My Forums CLOSED Down
[img]http://i35.tinypic.com/28gqw6p.jpg[/img] [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/dc3m95.jpg[/img]
All i have left is the 503... This might not be looking 2 good :( :blink:
Jagex Is Scared of people with 503's\508's, And if they starting paying attention to me so fast.. i think they are starting to find out bout other servers so this could ruin alot of communities like roon server etc.
I know this isnt the right section But i have to get your guys opinions on whats going on..
Like seriously, Jagex has already closed down frugooscape cuz of their 503 webclient so lets hear some opinions
(Try TO NOT FLAME.)

item.title: Wrong Section - But i HAVE To Post This
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

Well, Ever since i have started working on 503s (Some of you know bout it , its called ploxage 503: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,298939.0.html), Jagex has slowly started taking me down.

Step 1 - Deleting Videos Off Youtube…

Here is the AMOUNT Of Videos Left (WE HAD ABOUT 200+)

Step 2 - They Banned my youtube account…

Step 3 - They Deleted The Download link to my client…

Step 4 - They Got My Forums CLOSED Down


All i have left is the 503… This might not be looking 2 good :blink:

Jagex Is Scared of people with 503’s\508’s, And if they starting paying attention to me so fast… i think they are starting to find out bout other servers so this could ruin alot of communities like roon server etc.

I know this isnt the right section But i have to get your guys opinions on whats going on…

Like seriously, Jagex has already closed down frugooscape cuz of their 503 webclient so lets hear some opinions

(Try TO NOT FLAME.)
